subtitle: A centre-piece for a buffet party.

method.text: Cover the gammon with cold water in a large pan. Add the onion, bay leaf, carrots and pepper corns. Bring the gammon to the boil. Cover with a lid, then reduce the heat. Simmer for 1 hr 40 min.
Carefully remove the gammon from the cooking liquid. Discard the liquid. Leave gammon to cool slightly.
Score the gammon fat into diamonds with a sharp knife.
Cut the pineapple into 10-12 slices and place into a large non stick frying pan with the pineapple juice, honey mixture and lychees. Gently cook for 3-4 min or until just softened.
Stud the cloves into the centre of the diamonds on the gammon and sprinkle with sugar. Cook in the oven for 15-20 min or until glazed and golden brown. Baste occasionally with any juices.
Serve the gammon with the pineapple and lychees.

title: Pineapple glazed gammon ham
